lines.text:
[Caroline and Buckham have been watching Byron bare-knuckle boxing]
Haven't seen you about, milord.
Was that where you learned to fight like a *savage*?
No sir, I learned that at Harrow.

[Caroline has just slashed her wrists]
Good God, your Grace! She just tried to kill herself!
Nonsense, me boy. No difficulty about killing yourself, if you really mean to.

[on being told that Caroline has "died of a broken heart"]
My God... wouldn't she!
